name: Discharged Nimrod
behavior: Fast lightning melee enforcer with punishing combos.
description: Uses a tesla-charged staff. Watch for aerial telegraphs and roll through vertical strikes.

name: Sproutfolk Raiders
behavior: Hit-and-run group tactics; can overwhelm unprepared players.
description: Use terrain and shields to split them up.

name: Ode Sinecure
behavior: Designed to hunt Omen Beasts with layered defenses.
description: Punishing combos, requires disciplined shield timing.
